Notes: You will need a cable to connect the motor to the motor driver (A4988, see below). What cable will depend on the motor you use.

Component name: Mounting Hub for 5mm Shaft, M3 Holes

Notes: For the "MSR" indicator LED and the inner LEDs (L_11, ..., L_32)

Component name: Grove LCD RGB backlight display v4.0

Notes: See, e.g., https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/Grove-2.5A-DC-Current-Sensor-ACS70331/. No longer in production.

Component name: Grove Base Shield V2.0 for Arduino
